params.name: charset
params.description: The character encoding in which the string will be encoded.

params.name: force
params.description: When true the URLEncoder.encode(str, encoding)-function will be always called.

examples.title: URLEncode() example
examples.description: Shows how it url-encode a string.
examples.code:
getParam = URLEncode("URL-Encode this string, see also chars like: %&/().");
WriteOutput(getParam);

examples.title: URLEncode() usage as a member function
examples.description: Same Example like above, but this time we use it as a member-function.
examples.code:
getParam = "URL-Encode this string, see also chars like: %&/().";
WriteOutput(getParam.URLEncode());
